# u-error-message

## Properties

| Property             | Attribute    | Description                                                                     | Type                       | Default     |
| -------------------- | ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------- | ----------- |
| `componentClassName` | `class-name` | CSS classes to apply to the host element.                                       | `string`                   | `""`        |
| `errorMessages`      | --           | Custom error messages keyed by error code. Overrides default translations.      | `{ [x: string]: string; }` | `undefined` |
| `for` _(required)_   | `for`        | The error type to display (e.g., 'email', 'password', 'general', 'connection'). | `string`                   | `undefined` |
